title: thebitcoinhole

content: At https://thebitcoinhole.com/ we compare 50 different hardware wallets, feature by feature. We also list the best deals to buy a hardware wallet.Here there is a list of all the current Black Friday deals:Blockstream Jade:- Original price: U$S 64.99- Black Friday price (10% off): U$S 58.49- comments.author: FatFork
comments.created_time: November 24, 2023, 09:26:23 AMLast edit: November 24, 2023, 09:54:05 AM by FatFork
comments.body: GridPlus is giving us a $100 discount on the Lattice1 hardware wallet. Just enter the code "BlockFriday100" (it's case sensitive) during checkout.https://x.com/gridplus/status/1727790414646665304?s=20OneKey is offering a 20% discount for Black Friday and Cyber Monday on all their devices. However, from what I can gather, the discount is only applicable to their Amazon store.https://twitter.com/OneKeyHQ/status/1727588899785167120OneKey Mini- Original price: $ 59.00- Black Friday price (20% off): $ 47.20- More info: https://www.amazon.com/OneKey-Mini-Hardware-Wallet-securely/dp/B0B2MWW2WJOneKey Classic- Original price: $ 89.00- Black Friday price (20% off): $ 71.20- More info: https://www.amazon.com/OneKey-Classic-Hardware-Wallet-securely/dp/B0BCV1D1VYOneKey Touch- Original price: $ 249.00- Black Friday price (20% off): $ 199.20- More info: https://www.amazon.com/Hardware-OneKey-Internet-Isolated-Security/dp/B0CFHPQLZNOneKey Crypto Seed Storage Lite- Original price: $ 19.00- Black Friday price (20% off): $ 15.20- More info: https://www.amazon.com/OneKey-Lite-Source-Recovery-Phrase/dp/B0B4KGG7LBOneKey KeyTag- Crypto Seed Backup (2pcs with Punch Tool)- Original price: $ 59.00- Black Friday price (20% off): $ 47.20- More info: https://www.amazon.com/OneKey-KeyTag-Recovery-Titanium-Compatible/dp/B0BLBZDNRN

comments.author: Meuserna
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on November 24, 2023, 09:26:23 AMOneKey is offering a 20% discount for Black Friday and Cyber Monday on all their devices. However, from what I can gather, the discount is only applicable to their Amazon store.https://twitter.com/OneKeyHQ/status/1727588899785167120OneKey Mini- Original price: $ 59.00- Black Friday price (20% off): $ 47.20Heads up: OneKey said on Reddit a month or two ago that the OneKey Mini is being discontinued, which is a shame since it's a nice little wallet.  Maybe they changed their mind, or maybe they're selling the remaining stock?

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: Meuserna on November 24, 2023, 11:20:59 PMHeads up: OneKey said on Reddit a month or two ago that the OneKey Mini is being discontinued, which is a shame since it's a nice little wallet.  Maybe they changed their mind, or maybe they're selling the remaining stock?Discontinued already ?!  They are getting worse than ledger, and I was right when I said that they look to me like a bunch of amateurs.I think they want to use their new OS from now on, instead of forked trezor firmware, and that is probably impossible to work on Onekey mini memory.Thanks for posting this, I didn't see this news so far.

comments.author: OROBTC
comments.body: ...BestBuy is now listing Trezor Model 1 and Model T to arrive for pickup at Best Buy stores (USA and Canada) for Dec 6.  Been pushed back a few days.  It would not surprise me if it is delayed some more.  As of now (Nov 29), BB still lists Model T at $153.Being able to buy a Trezor for cash at a store is a good thing.  I hope that Trezor has good luck in selling their devices at Best Buys.
